content.question: Which of the following developments most likely explains the trade policies Burlingame advocates in the excerpt?

choices.label: Growing influence of populist political arguments
Continuing resistance to the formation of labor unions
Increasing support for laissez-faire economic policies
Developing practices of sharecropping and tenant farming

content.answer: Increasing support for laissez-faire economic policies

topic.text: 6.12: Controversies over the Role of Government in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
